body_html:
I do not see the need to expand the API with this, but I will let @wicke comment on that.
What does this new function offer that get_root_dir_with_all_resources won't offer?
Again, any paths you access has to be under the runfiles dir, as our testinfra will soon turn on sandboxing everywhere. This means after the test binaries are built, they will run on a completely isolated environment by themselves, without the rest of TF code. Sometimes they wont even be on the same machine with the rest of the TF source code.

I do not see the need to expand the API with this, but I will let @wicke comment on that.
What does this new function offer that `get_root_dir_with_all_resources` won't offer?
Again, any paths you access has to be under the runfiles dir, as our testinfra will soon turn on sandboxing everywhere. This means after the test binaries are built, they will run on a completely isolated environment by themselves, without the rest of TF code. Sometimes they wont even be on the same machine with the rest of the TF source code.
